relation: The food is alright. It's not to bad but also not all that. Some days the food taste just like a home cooked meal.
I live in a all girl dorm. It's really cozy and quiet. Everybody respects the meaning of quiet hours.

I am a chemistry major and so far chem is going well. The professor is very friendly and easy to talk to. Class sizes are decent size making it much easy to have that one on one connection with the professor.
Be yourself. There's always something to do on campus. Join clubs and meet some really nice people.
American International is a private college. Everybody at the school minority is black or Hispanic. I would rate it 6 out of 10.
pageTitle: American International College (AIC) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Ashley from Longmeadow, MA 02/07/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 13 Categories Comments Campus Safety the actual campus itself is very safe...there are always campus police walking around and there are several emergency buttons. dorms are electronically protected in several ways. however, the neighborhood surrounding the campus is horrible and very unsafe. gangs and murders... Greek Life there is some, but not many. Clubs and Activities i have to say, aic has just about any club you can imagine. if they don't have a club that you are interested in, it is very easy to start one yourself. sports are huge here. Great for these types of students it is good for students who need more individualized attention in their classes. not good for someone seeking a party school... Share
